name: enewmall
short_description:
Buttoned tops are pretty ordinary. They can be seen anywhere – from college students to celebrities to athletes to random people to office girls. They are everywhere! We all love buttoned tops. That’s a fact. They are simply chic and elegant.

There are a lot of buttoned tops are there. Trends have been transforming this piece into an elegant top. Here are some trends and ways on how to wear buttoned tops.
Florals. Florals are really girly. This pattern or design is probably one of the easiest ways to look chic without having to wear tons of accessories and a really attractive bottom. A floral top can already look elegant on its own. Usually, florals are best worn during the day. So you can go out for coffee with a floral buttoned top paired with khaki shorts and sandals. You will surely look great in this ensemble.
